name: backend-exercises
description: Backend exercises for Full Stack Open 2019 Course.

scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q build && cd ../Full-stack-open-exercises/part2/part2-b(phone_book) && npm run build --prod && xcopy build "C:\Users\JB MADHUBALA\Projects\backend-phonebook\build" /e /i
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m ui_build && git push && npm run deploy
